name: transactions_feed
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_whale_transactions.
Tool description: Get latest huge crypto transactions for most popular blockchains
API description: Get latest huge whale transactions for most popular blockchains.

**Filter by txn value. Add parameters as below:**
<_amount_usd=10000 
OR
>amount_usd=10000

**Filter by blockchain:**
 t_blockchain=bitcoin

Available blockchains: bitcoin, bitcoin-cash, ethereum, bitcoin-sv, litecoin, tron, ripple, zcash, dogecoin, neo, eos, dash, ethereum-classic, tezos, binancechain, stellar, groestlcoin, icon, steem, cosmos, decred, verge, hypercash, siacoin


**Pagination:**
Add parameter: size=100

s_amount_usd.description: Filters transactions by value in USD. Use 'desc' for descending order.

size.description: Number of transactions to fetch. Defaults to '20'.

t_blockchain.description: Specifies the blockchain to filter transactions. Defaults to 'ethereum'.
